articles.title: About Leonardo Feitosa
articles.contents:
Skills
Language proficiencies:
Portuguese: Native speaker
English: Fluent speaker (TOEFL IBT: 114)
Spanish: Good understanding
Computer:
Microsoft office
R programming: basic skills
Research:
DNA extraction, amplification, and molecular data analyses
Elasmobranch vertebrae processing, ageing, and microchemistry data analysis
Experience and projects:
Assessing elasmobranch nursery areas on a global conservation hotspot for improved management (ongoing).
Description: We use samples from vertebrae of six critically endangered or data deficient elasmobranch species on Brazil’s northern coast spanning from Maranhão to Amapá states. With them, microchemistry analysis will be carried out in order to obtain their habitat use patterns and, together with their biological information obtained from published studies, we will determine the key areas for their conservation in the region. Through that, areas considered as nurseries will be evaluated. Finally, a management plan will de developed taking into consideration the habitat use information obtained.

articles.title: Shark and ray science from a Latin American perspective
Leonardo Feitosa
articles.contents:
Leonardo Feitosa
          
          
          Home
          About Me
          Blog
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Leonardo Feitosa
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        ResearchGate
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        Google Scholar
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        Twitter
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        GitHub
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        Currículo Lattes
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            [ENGLISH]
            I’m a Brazilian marine biologist undertaking my PhD degree at the Bren School of Environmental Science and Management in the University of California, Santa Barbara. My research interests include fisheries management, conservation of sharks and rays, habitat use, and bycatch modeling and mitigation for achieving sustainable fisheries.
            I believe that we can have a sustainable relationship to marine resources with science-based measures and the support of society as a whole. My main goal is to be a part of that change and help ensure food security, sustainability for both fishers, local populations, and the exploited stocks.
            [PORTUGUÊS]
            Sou um biólogo marinho brasileiro, atualmente fazendo meu doutorado na Bren School of Environmental Science and Management na Universidae da Califórnia, Santa Barbara. Minhas pesquisas incluem manejo de pesca, conservação de tubarões e raias, uso de habitat e modelagem e mitigação de capturas acidentais para alcançarmos pescarias sustentáveis.
            Acredito que podemos ter uma relação sustentável com os recursos marinhos se delimitarmos medidas baseadas nas evidências científicas e no suporte da sociedade como um todo. Meu principal objetivo é ser parte desta mudança e ajudar a garantir segurança alimentar e sustentabilidae para os pescadores, populações locais e os estoques pesqueiros explotados.
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Leonardo Feitosa

Minhas pesquisas incluem manejo de pesca, conservação de tubarões e raias, uso de habitat e modelagem e mitigação de capturas acidentais para alcançarmos pescarias sustentáveis.
